description: The holidays are just around the corner, but if you're looking for a unique cocktail recipe to enjoy before all your guests arrive, then this is the one. The&nbsp;bourbon gives this classic cocktail a unique twist that everyone loves!
keywords: Frozen Bourbon Milk Punch Cocktail Recipe
How To Frozen Bourbon Milk Punch
name: Frozen Bourbon Milk Punch

recipeInstructions.name: Blend the ice cream, bourbon, and vanilla until smooth.
recipeInstructions.text: Blend the ice cream, bourbon, and vanilla until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into the glass, serve with grated nutmeg, and serve with a straw.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into the glass, serve with grated nutmeg, and serve with a straw.
